Added Callback Line. We can make smooth calls even when the network signal is not good!
Added Callback Line. We can make smooth calls even when the network signal is not good!
Added Callback Line. We can make smooth calls even when the network signal is not good!
Added Callback Line. We can make smooth calls even when the network signal is not good!

Callback Line:
With our new callback line, you can now make your long distance calls cheaper than ever on your WePhone app without needing an internet connection!

Use on Multiple Devices:
You can share and use your phone line with your friends and colleagues when they install WePhone on their devices. One phone line can be added to multiple devices. This lets your whole team text and respond to customers from their own phones. Stay synced when calling and texting!

MMS/SMS:
Send and receive picture/photo messages as text messages(MMS) to friends and family! It can be used with your second phone number!

Call forwarding:
Now you can forward your calls from the app!

Adding Do Not Disturb Feature:
You can now enable disturb mode to block all calls.

Get British Phone Numbers:
Aside from USA and Canadian numbers, buy and use numbers from England(United Kingdom/Great Britain) right here in WePhone!!!

WePhone Contacts:
Share your contacts with teammates or co-workers using the new WePhone contacts feature when logged into the same WePhone account. Stay on the same page with your team!

Manage all devices: 
In your settings, see all devices that are sharing your account and manage their access to your account.

Play Audio Messages:
Listen to audio messages in the multimedia(MMS) texts that your friends send you.

Canada/United States New Unlimited Plan:
Unlock unlimited calling in the United States and Canada now for one flat price with our new Unlimited Plan!! Never worry about going over your balance ever again!

WePhone Contacts: 
This new feature lets you manage your existing phone contacts and add them to the WePhone Contacts cloud. Once your contacts are on WePhone Contacts cloud, with App and new WebChat, you can message them using any of your devices! Stay synced with your contacts wherever you go!

Block Calls/Texts:
Scam calls? Spam texts? Block them all with our new blacklist feature!! Never be harassed or disrupted by unwelcomed calls and texts ever again!

Voicemail:
With the release of our new voicemail feature, you can listen to and leave voicemail within the WePhone app! Check your voicemails under your messages!

Verification Code SMS Helper:
Receive Verification Code SMS from different Apps for both short-term and long-term use!! Help you use different Apps smoothly and protect your privacy!
